identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-density, operationally focused flight booking terminal that balances corporate professionalism with Swiss-style typographic clarity. No fluff, just function.

headings.usage: Page titles, section headers, modal titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

data.usage: PNR numbers, Ticket Numbers, Currency values, Date/Time stamps. This adds the 'Terminal' aesthetic.

usage_rules: Never use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid, flat colors.
Sidebar must be dark (#0F172A) with white text to create a strong anchor.
Data tables must have alternating row colors (zebra striping) using 'bg-slate-50/50' for readability.
Use 'text-slate-400' for secondary labels, never pure gray.

layout.grid_system: The Bento Grid - Mode B (High Density)

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (250px), dark theme, full height.
structure.header: Sticky top, white background, bottom border (border-slate-200).

rules: Avoid 'floating cards' with heavy shadows. Use 'Border-First' design: 1px solid borders (border-slate-200) with minimal or no shadow.
Dashboard widgets should fill the grid completely (h-full).
Forms should be sectioned with clear headings and dividers.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 hover:text-slate-900 h-10 px-4 rounded-md

cards.header: p-4 border-b border-slate-100 flex justify-between items-center

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-950 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

micro_interactions: Subtle scale effect on primary buttons (active:scale-95).
textures: No noise or grain. Keep it clean and digital.
Use 'border-collapse' look for data grids to emphasize structure.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px (thin and precise). Size 16px or 18px for density.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for Login Page with a dark overlay (bg-slate-900/80).

rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Focus rings must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-blue-500).
All inputs must have associated labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Sidebar Layout' as the main wrapper for the dashboard.
Use 'TanStack Table' for the Booking List and Reports. This is non-negotiable for performance.
Use 'Recharts' for the Dashboard charts (Simple Bar and Line charts only).
For the Booking Form, use a 'Wizard' or 'Tabs' approach to break down the complexity (Passenger Details -> Flight Details -> Payment).
Ensure the 'PNR' and 'Status' fields are visually distinct in lists (use Badges).
Use the provided image URLs for the login page and mock user profiles.
Do not use 'Inter' for Headings. Import 'Manrope' from Google Fonts.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for the sticky header.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
